articles.title: Apple is giving iPhone 14 and 15 users another free year of satellite features - The Verge
articles.description: iPhone 14 and iPhone 15 users are getting an additional year of free access to satellite connectivity features, according to Apple’s iPhone 17 press releases.
articles.content: People on an iPhone 14 or 15 wont have to pay for Apples satellite messaging until as early as November 2026. People on an iPhone 14 or 15 wont have to pay for … [+2476 chars]

articles.title: Apple reveals iPadOS 26 release date - The Verge
articles.description: Apple has announced the release date for iPadOS 26, which comes with the Liquid Glass design language and new windowing features for better multitasking.
